name: Waterside Resort VR
description:
This app is compatible with Google Cardboard and will provide a Virtual Reality experience giving you a virtual tour of our resort.

If you don't have a Google Cardboard, this app also supports a standard (gyro) mode, so you aren't left out.

We hope you enjoy this app and like our resort. The next time you are in Thailand, come and stay with us and enjoy total relaxation and hospitality.

For bookings and more, please visit the Waterside Resort website at http://www.watersideresortpranburi.com

Features:

  • Full 360x360 degree view
  • Compatible with Google Cardboard
  • Works without Google Cardboard
  • Uplifting soundtrack
  • Made using actual photos

Waterside Resort's spacious and peaceful waterside pool villas are surrounded by a pristine river and mountain for relaxation with all the comforts and amenities required for a home away from home experience.

A favorite getaway for Bangkok residents, Hua Hin is a pretty little beachside town. Family friendly and relaxed, Hua Hin was transformed into a royal resort. This close link with Thai royalty helps ensure that Hua Hin won't become overdeveloped or lose its small-town vibe.

Privacy Policy: http://www.burningneuron.io/privacy.html
